option.od: print the help message and exit.
verbose. Log information to the console.
filename of the cnvmap format file. If this is omitted the file is read from standard input.

synopsis.p: Convert a cnvmap format file to a map format file.

description.p: Convert a cnvmap format file to a map format file.
The converted file is written to standard output.

example.description: Convert the cnvmap format file "20040402.cnvmap" to the map format file "20040402.map".
